overview:
Playcharts.com is a simple music video site with five music video playlists featuring the most popular charts in pop - rock - r&b - hiphop & dance.

Playcharts.com makes it easy and simple to get quick access to playlists of the newest and most popular music videos. You donâ€™t have to make your own playlist, spend hours searching or register a profile.

Each playlist includes the top 100 music videos plus this monthâ€™s newest releases. All together playcharts.com offer +26 hours of uninterrupted and continuously playing music videos.

The service is ideal for private parties, doing homework, office work, relaxing, or just for checking out the latest music videos.
